task.title: Disconnecting the Muffler
task.shortdesc: This task describes how to disconnect the muffler from the exhaust pipe and vehicle frame, and how to disassemble it if needed.

step.cmd: Disconnect the exhaust pipe from the engine
step.info: Unscrew the pack nut connecting the exhaust pipe to the motor
Remove the bolts securing the muffler to the frame
Remove the nut at the rear end of the muffler to disassemble it
